title: Sister's Man
description: Kim Shin, who is about to get married, meets his fianc√©e's twin sister. Although she has the same face as her older sister, Kim Shin finds himself drawn to the pure and feminine twin. However, being timid and kind-hearted, he tries hard to deny his feelings. Chaos ensues in his married life when Kim Jin, his Dissociative Identity Disorder (DID) personality, thought to have disappeared, re-appears.
author: Sa-ilgong
